Title: Leonard Caul (No. 62)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier, Kristen Reidel, Jim Campolongo, Amanda Kate Shuman (executive story editor), Brandon Margolis (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: As Red fights for his life, he pleads with Liz to track down a key figure from his past with knowledge of the Fulcrum.
